titleStmt.title: Kollourion, or eye salve to anoint the eyes of the ministers of the Province of London; that they may see their error (at least) in opposing the present proceedings of the Parliament and Army, in the due execution of justice. / By a Minister of the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Minister of the Gospel.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Dawson for Henry Cripps and are to be sold in Popes-head Alley,

notesStmt.note: The first word of the title is transliterated from the Greek.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
